x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many remote schools are missing from national statistics. Without visibility, they receive no teachers, water, or power. Communities lack a structured way to record needs, leaving the most vulnerable schools unseen and unsupported.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A community platform collects data on students, teachers, facilities, and safety. Information is displayed through maps and dashboards showing urgent needs. Reports guide interventions and track progress over time.

ServiceNow Applications and Capabilities Used

  • Performance Analytics visualizes needs through dashboards and maps. 
  • Custom database tables store school data.
  • Survey tools support data entry.
  • Workflow handles validation. 
  • Service Portal allows submissions.
  • Integration Hub connects with government systems.
  • Document Generation creates reports,
  • The mobile app enables field use.



 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • ServiceNow Performance Analytics, Integration Hub, and Survey
  • Mobile and GPS support for data capture
  • Role-based access and data encryption

 

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Verifying accuracy, preventing duplicates, protecting sensitive data, keeping updates current, balancing transparency with safety, and managing government collaboration and system compatibility.
